name: Shadow Love Puzzle
description:
Find the true love by your smart!
STORY OF THE GAME :
In shadow world the one eyes monster Fall in love.
could you help them to meet each others in the dark shadow world.
SUGGESTION :
let us enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game and don't waste the chance to make love story happen between one eyes monster.
INFORMATION:
this puzzle game is Good for young and old and When you get the level 7, this puzzle game will be your favorite game!
